sessions.title: Accelerate building infrastructure with Azure Verified Modules
sessions.description:
In this session, we will explore everything around Azure Verified Modules, a powerful set of Azure Bicep or Terraform templates. These sets of templates are built and maintained by Microsoft to set a standardisation for infrastructure as code templates and to elevate the quality of deployments.
Azure Verified Modules are pre-built, tested, and WAF-aligned IaC templates that facilitate the deployment and management of Azure resources. These modules aim to streamline the development process by providing reusable and secure templates, reducing the need for custom coding, and minimising errors.

speakers.name: John Lokerse
speakers.title: DevOps Consultant, Azure Bicep enthusiast and Azure MVP on DevOps and Azure Infrastructure-as-Code
